description.oldValue:
Meeting organizers and presenters can now manage the audio capabilities of meeting attendees. Before the meeting, organizers can enable or disable the ability for attendees to use their mic (i.e. share audio), and during the meeting both the organizer and meeting presenters can modify attendee speaking capabilities.
GA date: January CY2023
description.newValue:
Meeting organizers and presenters can now manage the audio capabilities
of meeting attendees. Before the meeting, organizers can enable or disable the
ability for attendees to use their mic (i.e. share audio), and during the
meeting both the organizer and meeting presenters can modify attendee speaking
capabilities.
